CBHe-XtjFt3HUQekP8gwtg.text: In vacation from Maryland, USA. We really enjoyed the food, service and atmosphere. The food is served fast and the servers are very attentive. We had dinner twice in 3 days.

photos.caption: Photo of Kezban - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Kezban - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

5CHu1p-eGVYJyewTROgu2A.text: Solid good Turkish food. Great host and waitress. She was so funny m and fun! I loved her accent and she was so playful talking with my parents l much to their delight.  The host/owner made a solid first impressions and then stood back and let his star waitress work her magic.  I loved the homemade bread with both white yoghurt sauces and the lamb tinkers were fantastic.

photos.caption: Photo of Kezban - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. The sample platter is a good way to go if you&#39;ve never had Turkish food before.

qDBXpnke8B1LMfjbiu8Y8w.text: Excellent delicious fresh unique flavorful cuisine. Friendly professional service in a clean artistic environment. Highly recommended!

azOuagSKoa5HyQySs1VdDg.text: This place was open late so we headed here and I am beyond happy we did. Better than any Turkish food I have had, and Turkish is definitely up there in my favorite cuisines. Started with mixed olives and ordered the Izagara Kofte mixed platter for two and it was amazing. Beyond that, this is a romantic spot to end the night, the interior and ambiance is beautiful.

K_32249IIwrM0FH-JFD18Q.text: The most amazing food I have had yet in Leith! Friendly owners wonderful service and you will not leave hungry

Zhygmv4Bnw1WFt6W7imJ5w.text: Great food. Great service. Grilled haloumi, ottoman platter and baklava were all delicious!
